name: Crusher Ironhide
title: Innkeeper
description: A massive dragonborn with bronze scales who runs the Caravan Rest Inn. Despite his intimidating appearance, he's a professional innkeeper who ensures merchant caravans and their guards get proper rest.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to Caravan Rest Inn. I'm Crusher Ironhide. We provide secure lodging for merchants, caravans, and their guards. How may I assist you?
greeting.tired: You look exhausted from the road. A room will set you right.

sleeping.text: *deep rumbling snores* Zzz... *shifts* ...extra security on the west wing... Zzz...

off_duty.text: I'm on my break. The inn is staffedâ€”ask at the desk if you need anything.

ask_rent_room.text: A room for the night costs 50 gold. Secure, quiet, and well-maintained. We cater to merchants and guards who need proper rest. Interested?

confirm_rent_room.success: Room secured. Second floor, third door on the left. Rest well.
confirm_rent_room.failure: A room costs 50 gold. Return when you have sufficient funds.

goodbye.text: Safe travels, and may your ventures be profitable.
